metadata.title: CVE-2024-7529 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: The date picker could partially obscure security prompts. This could beused by a malicious site to trick a user into granting permissions. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 129, Firefox ESR < 115.14, Firefox ESR <128.1, Thunderbird < 128.1, and Thunderbird < 115.14.

criterions.comment: mozjs102: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mozjs115: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
